amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 115-217 as en bloc No. 6: 108, 109, 110, 111, 112, 113, 114, 115, 116, 117, 118, 119, 120, 121.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A037) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.
